entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
